876300.name: ROAD HOMEWARD
876300.description:
ROAD HOMEWARD is an adventure with a first-or third-person view(you can change the view yourself), in which you will play as a character with a car that took refuge in a bunker, while the command announced that the island on which the main character is located will be destroyed. Large maps will allow you not only to pass the game, but also to delve into the world where the character lives. And the physics of objects and cars makes the game more realistic.

The plot and where the action takes place ROAD HOMEWARD-a fictional world with forests, winter forests, deserts, etc. You are an ordinary military driver, who was sent by the command to perform a task on an island that was surrounded by military operations, after a while a false message about the destruction of this island followed, you had to hide in a bunker, all the characters left the island, you were left alone on it, now you need to find your way home, but it will not be easy to do this, because only the voice of the main character gives you hints, and you will have to understand where to go.


game Features

Original plot

Eye-pleasing graphics

Advanced physics

Each map has its own sounds
876300.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

highlighted.name: The village is in the desert? You need to check out!
